thread.title: tutorial tip func_pendulom on all axis

post.author: voldemort
post.body:
tutorial tip func_pendulom on all axis
the title is a little misleading but also the title of another tutorial really didnt explain all its uses
A func_shakeking can be used just like a func_pendulom but on any axis
here is a link that briefly discusses how to use it
http://www.doom3world.org/phpbb2/viewto ... 012#147012
here is another tutorial that got side tracked on how to create pistons and cranks the later parts of the thread touch on how func_shaking can be used this way and in other ways as well
http://www.doom3world.org/phpbb2/viewto ... c&start=40
I figured I needed another link that maybe gave a clearer idea of the possiblilities because the original title about rotating fans was misleading if you wernt looking to make a fan then you might miss it
